sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十一，小餘八百三十八；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder eleven, small remainder eight hundred thirty eight;
Large remainder fifteen, no small remainder;

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘六，小餘二百四十六；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder six, small remainder two hundred forty six;
Large remainder twenty, small remainder eight;
Duameng Shan E Yong Guang first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三無大餘，小餘五百九十四；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen no large remainder, small remainder five hundred ninety four;
Large remainder twenty five, small remainder sixteen;
You Zhao Zhi Xu second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十四，小餘五百一；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty four, small remainder five hundred one;
Large remainder thirty, small remainder twenty four;
Qiang Wu Da Huang Luo third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十八，小餘八百四十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder eighteen, small remainder eight hundred forty nine;
Large remainder thirty six, no small remainder;
Tu Wei Dun Zang fourth year.
